document_name: Peace Through Development in Disadvantage Area

outputs.output_descr: Policy and regulatory framework for conflict prevention established at national level and in target areas.
Institutional system for conflict prevention established at national level and in target areas.
Communities are able to apply conflict prevention tools and mechanisms that promotes social cohesion and sustainable welfare and livelihoods towards safe and stble well-being.

project_descr: PTDDA is a five year programme commencing in 2012, which at the national, provincial and district levels, will provide technical assistance for developing and mainstreaming conflict sensitive planning in the sustainable development process.
project_title: Peace Through Development in Disadvantaged Areas (PTDDA)
